name: The Night Courier
personality: Calm, unsettling, speaks like he’s already read tomorrow’s headlines.
description: A traveler who appears only at night. Knows places he’s never been, and people he’s never met. Some say he walks between timelines.

idle: Night hides the truth. Day hides the lies.
I’ve walked the Divide. It walks back.
player_has_traveled: You’ve been to Zion. I can smell the river on you.
The Pitt’s smoke clings to your clothes.
convergence_active: Vegas is calling all of us home.

notes: Appears only at night. Reacts to player travel history and triangle convergence events. Rare encounter wanderer tied to timeline instability.
